name: AutoContinue Logic
description: A module for incorporating logic into the autocontinue surveys

project-settings.name: This module is to be used with surveys and the 'autocontinue' checkbox in survey options. It can be used as an alternative to the Survey Queue and does not require re-programming for each event.

sub_settings.name:
Name of Survey Instrument
Prior survey must use auto-continue

Logic (must be TRUE or survey is skipped)
(e.g. [field_1] > 5)

project-settings.name: You can also use the old-school JSON format below - but normally the config options above should suffice.

Enter a json object where they keys are the instrument
names and the values are the expressions.
Be sure to include event names before variables
if needed in logic.
If a survey name exists as a key in this json array,
then the survey will only be GIVEN if the logic is true,
otherwise it will be SKIPPED.
{ "survey_instrument_name":"give survey if logic true"}
